headline: Ask HN: How do I contact Google to appeal a Featured badge review decision
description:
Hi HN,

I made a Chrome extension[0] and requested for Featured badge review. The extension allow users to send web articles, Twitter threads and newsletters to a Kindle or the official Kindle mobile app.

Unfortunately, Google declined to review it because they couldn't access to a Kindle device. However the extension also works with the official Kindle mobile app.

How can I contact them to appeal the decision, suggesting them to test on the official Kindle app?

They do not allow submitting the request again for 6 months.

Full disclosure: I screwed up. I submitted a link about it[1] but wasn't aware that it was misleading. English wasn't my first language so I thought it was ok to gain some exposure about the issue.

[0]: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ktool-send-web-aticles-to/igfcoofpmcdpcocfofdobneaileiogmo

[1]: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=32341971
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 我如何联系谷歌对特色徽章的审查决定提出上诉？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 我如何聯繫谷歌對特色徽章的審查決定提出上訴？
description_zh-Hans:
Hi HN,

我做了一个Chrome扩展[0]，并申请了特色徽章审查。该扩展允许用户将网络文章、Twitter线程和新闻通讯发送到Kindle或官方Kindle移动应用程序。

不幸的是，谷歌拒绝审查它，因为他们无法访问Kindle设备。

我怎样才能联系他们对这一决定提出上诉，建议他们在官方的Kindle应用程序上进行测试呢？我提交了一个关于它的链接[1]，但没有意识到它有误导性。英语不是我的第一语言，所以我认为获得一些关于这个问题的曝光是可以的。

[0]: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ktool-send-web-aticles-to/igfcoofpmcdpcocfofdobneaileiogmo

[1]: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=32341971
description_zh-Hant:
Hi HN,

我做了一個Chrome擴展[0]，並申請了特色徽章審查。該擴展允許用戶將網絡文章、Twitter線程和新聞通訊發送到Kindle或官方Kindle移動應用程序。

不幸的是，谷歌拒絕審查它，因為他們無法訪問Kindle設備。

我怎樣才能聯繫他們對這一決定提出上訴，建議他們在官方的Kindle應用程序上進行測試呢？我提交了一個關於它的鏈接[1]，但沒有意識到它有誤導性。英語不是我的第一語言，所以我認為獲得一些關於這個問題的曝光是可以的。

[0]: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ktool-send-web-aticles-to/igfcoofpmcdpcocfofdobneaileiogmo

[1]: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=32341971
